title: (x) Boston Globe Headers - Bodoni {Yves, Mike Y}
content:
[http://www.gerryarmstrong.org/50grand/images/boston-globe-1984-07-24.gif](http://web.archive.org/web/20050818223310/http:/www.gerryarmstrong.org/50grand/images/boston-globe-1984-07-24.gif)   
   
Some help, please? It looks almost exactly like Times. The only difference I can find is that the uppercase B has rectangular cutouts (is that the right word?)   
   
This font just looks fabulous when it's sitting on your doorstep.
author: ardecila
